The shepardes kalender Here beginneth the kalender of shepardes newly augmented and corrected. Compost et kalendrier des bergiers. English. Copland, Robert, fl. 1508-1547, attributed name.
[204] p. : ill.
By Thomas Este for Iohn Wally, [Imprinted at London : [1570?]]
A translation and revision (by Robert Copland?) of: Le compost et kalendrier des bergiers. Imprint from colophon; publication date suggested by STC. Signatures: A-L M⁶ N. Leaves G3-5 possibly from another copy--Folger Shakespeare Library catalog. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
=======
